page.title: 20Norton Area Acknowledgements
page.content: We would like to thank all the people in our area who helped us so readily and generously. Also the Shropshire County Library staff and Education Department staff, who assisted our work, and the B.B.C. for this opportunity to take part in their exciting project. If we have omitted anything important, or made any errors, this is not deliberately done. Anthony Bishop(10), Sioned Bowen(10), Rachael Chatham(8),Darren Childs(11), Wayne Griffin(10), Paul Hockenhull(11) Andrew Kyte(8), Emma Middleton(11), Timothy Middleton(10), Ian Piper(11), Daniel Roberts(8), Ben Spickernell(8), Claire Teague (10), Zoe Tranter (10), Nicola Weston(8).
